channel.title: [tut]how to make npc's
channel.description:
[size=20pt][b]I got Permission from pkgod to post this :) he hopes u enjoy, so if your going to thank anyone thank him in ur posts, ad plz post!:)[/b][/size]
[size=60pt]How To Make Npc's[/size] [b]Iv been bored lately and alot of people iv noticed lately (nubs who first creating a server) are always asking how do i create a monster on my server! So i have decided to just post another tut out there for those special people (this is a very very easy tut anyone can do it)[/b]
[b][u]Requirments: Autospawn.cfg[/u] [/b] [u][b]Difficulty: 1/10[/b][/u]
[b]Ok first off you need to go into your Autospawn.cfg and you'll probibley see a list of npc's and there positions.[/b] Like this- [code]spawn = 82 2832 3267 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2836 3270 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Greater Demon spawn = 82 2832 3275 0 3567 3276 3563 3273 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2836 3279 0 3567 3290 3563 3286 2 Greater Demon spawn = 82 2839 3281 0 3555 3284 3551 3280 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2829 3279 0 3578 3283 3575 3279 2 Greater Demon spawn = 53 2817 3288 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Red Dragon spawn = 53 2819 3292 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Red Dragon spawn = 53 2823 3284 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Red Dragon spawn = 54 2839 3296 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2844 3296 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2854 3302 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2851 3305 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2836 3294 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 182 2848 3280 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3283 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3277 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3274 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Pirate[/code]
Now the first digits [code]spawn = 54[/code] are the monsters #! [code]spawn = 54 2836 3294[/code] then the next to set of digits are the monsters coordinates! wich u can find by going into ur server and typing ::mypos. The rest of numbers dont really matter that much except for the last one they just point to were the monster will be aiming. So u no wat these numbers represent now! you can start making NPC's. Ill do a quick example!
find the NPC's code, lets say 54 so you do spawn = 54! Then you type ::mypos and find the monsters coordintes, lets say 2847,3274. you now put these togetther like so! [code]spawn = 54 2836 3294[/code] then the rest u can just add 0's except for the last one just do 1. so in the end your code should look like this. [code]spawn = 54 2836 3294 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon[/code]
This was my first tutorial So tyvm for reading, i tried to make as clear as possible but i didnt have alot of time on my hands so god luck :) ~~~Pkgod[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 22, 2008, 01:18:46 AM[/size][hr]oops wring section lol plz lock :) :|

item.title: [tut]how to make npc's
item.dc:creator: @wyski wyski
item.description:
@wyski wrote:

[size=20pt]I got Permission from pkgod to post this he hopes u enjoy, so if your going to thank anyone thank him in ur posts, ad plz post![/size]

[size=60pt]How To Make Npc’s[/size]
Iv been bored lately and alot of people iv noticed lately (nubs who first creating a server) are always asking how do i create a monster on my server!
So i have decided to just post another tut out there for those special people (this is a very very easy tut anyone can do it)

Requirments: Autospawn.cfg
Difficulty: 1/10

Ok first off you need to go into your Autospawn.cfg and you’ll probibley see a list of npc’s and there positions.
Like this-

spawn = 82 2832 3267 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2836 3270 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Greater Demon spawn = 82 2832 3275 0 3567 3276 3563 3273 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2836 3279 0 3567 3290 3563 3286 2 Greater Demon spawn = 82 2839 3281 0 3555 3284 3551 3280 2 Lesser Demon spawn = 83 2829 3279 0 3578 3283 3575 3279 2 Greater Demon spawn = 53 2817 3288 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Red Dragon spawn = 53 2819 3292 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Red Dragon spawn = 53 2823 3284 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Red Dragon spawn = 54 2839 3296 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2844 3296 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2854 3302 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2851 3305 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 54 2836 3294 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Black Dragon spawn = 182 2848 3280 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3283 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3277 0 3577 3300 3573 3296 2 Pirate spawn = 182 2847 3274 0 3558 3299 3556 3295 2 Pirate

Now the first digits spawn = 54 are the monsters #! spawn = 54 2836 3294 then the next to set of digits are the monsters coordinates! wich u can find by going into ur server and typing ::mypos. The rest of numbers dont really matter that much except for the last one they just point to were the monster will be aiming. So u no wat these numbers represent now! you can start making NPC’s. Ill do a quick example!

find the NPC’s code, lets say 54 so you do spawn = 54! Then you type ::mypos and find the monsters coordintes, lets say 2847,3274. you now put these togetther like so!

spawn = 54 2836 3294 then the rest u can just add 0’s except for the last one just do 1. so in the end your code should look like this.

spawn = 54	2836	3294	0	3558	3299	3556	3295	2	Black Dragon

This was my first tutorial So tyvm for reading, i tried to make as clear as possible but i didnt have alot of time on my hands so god luck

Read full topic
